name: Surge
description: Surge is a multi-chain, AI-driven Internet Capital Markets (ICM) launchpad built across Binance Smart Chain, Base, and Solana. It bridges startups and investors through a transparent, data-driven fundraising model powered by real-time AI analytics. Founders gain instant market validation and capital access, while investors access early-stage, high-potential projects without VC gatekeeping. By fusing AI, liquidity, and interoperability, Surge democratizes startup investing â€” making global innovation faster, fairer, and more accessible to everyone.
